message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15,000 represents the value I place on the product, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.

Hi Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer and coming down to $13,500. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to make a new offer. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
